text: What I do is not some magical, mystical thing. I simply get up in the morning, get to work on time, say my lines, and do the best I can.
author: Parker Stevenson

text: Now I know that that is just the phenomena of eating this way. Most all of my letters say I hit a plateau and then one morning I woke up and the melt had happened.
author: Suzanne Somers

text: I'll always remember when I bumped into Good Morning America's Robin Roberts on a flight to my mother's funeral in 1994, and how kind she was during that difficult time.
author: Gayle King

text: When I found out I was going to be on CBS every morning, my first phone call was to Jenny Craig. Ten days later, I'd lost nine pounds. Now I even take the plan's popcorn with me to the movies.
author: Gayle King

text: There are 435 members of Congress. There's one 'Morning Joe' show. Hopefully, we can keep hammering the argument that you can disagree with other people and have debates but remain civil.
author: Joe Scarborough
